Goals (in decreasing order of specificity):

1. See if the posterior means and standard errors returned from `ruvb` are competitive when inserted into `ash`.
2. Generally provide more ways to differentiate between RUVB and other control gene methods.
3. Explore FDR control in confounder adjustment methods.
